endpoints.description: Retrieve the complete health records of a specific patient.
Submit updated health record information for a specific patient.
Access the list of patients accessible to the user based on their authorization level.
Add a new patient to the system.
Remove a patient's records from the system, adhering to all compliance requirements.
Retrieve the list of healthcare providers using this service.
Obtain utilization metrics regarding EHR system usage.
Facilitate the sharing of a patient's records with another authorized entity.
Update secure access settings and configurations for record management.
Retrieve an audit trail of all access and modifications to patient records.
